channel.title: Cammy PvP Reinstated Source and Client Released! Fullscreen client too!
channel.description:
Why play Cammy PvP Reinstated?
We are a spawn PvP based server, which is unique, and based off Cammy PvP. We chose this base, due to the influx of good ole’ times, and memories we had. So, what’s different? Our graphics, models, animations, features and so much more! We have all 641 items, curses, overloads, claws etc. Get ready for the ultimate PK experience!
Features
Webclient 24/7 VPS hosted! Primal and all current Runescape Items working! Donator Zone! Amazingly stable base! Active player base, daily pkers Fixed ::master so you can’t do it in wilderness ::master enabled ::pure enabled ::toggle enabled for EXP lock ::fp for FUNPK working 100%! Kill/Death Ratio Wildernes timer that counts from 10 Curses working 100%! Custom quest tab like no-other server! Rocktails 100% Extremes and Overloads 100% All Turmoil 100% PvP Drops All Magic working 100% Staff of Light working 100% All Godswords, Dragon Claws working 100% with proper hits All Chaotic Items 100% Slayer Helmet 100% Combat Formula to 138 like Runescape! Elite Void with proper effects! All PvP Armours and Weapons with proper effects and specials! [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2rzdpx3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/wa1q9u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2yzhs07.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lihmcm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/17u520.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/i59mba.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ina71l.png[/img]
The server had 30-40 players in the one month that it was up. I can't host it anymore, so I'm releasing it.
Packaged download: http://www.mediafire.com/?aknpllbrllz5ct7

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“austin cadle, post:10, topic:403741”][quote author=rang3 pkz link=topic=500805.msg3663397#msg3663397 date=1310484001]
It’s a client jar. I don’t have a run.bat
[/quote]
Make one? My friend tried to run the client it asked for permission he hit allow then it disappeared. . .

Look fix that by making a .bat and I’ll rep++[/quote]

@ECHO OFF
java -jar "File_Name.jar"
@Exit

Simple…

Read full topic
